'''Sûri-kylä''' is a settlement of the [[Lossoth]] in [[Forochel]] in the game ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''.

It is the capital of the region [[Forochel]], and at the westernmost point of the settlement stands the Great Lodge. In the Great Lodge sits the Council of Elders and the Lossoth's current leader: Yrjänä.<ref>{{LOTROW|Great Lodge of Sûri-kylä|2025-08-13}} – Yrjänä is a Finnish first name.</ref>

==Etymology==
''Sûri-kylä'' is actually Finnish (normally written "suuri kylä") and means "Large Village".<ref>{{LOTROW|Sûri-kylä|2025-08-13}}</ref>
